class.name: ZIPReader
class.brief_description: Allows reading the content of a ZIP file.

method.name: close
method.description: Closes the underlying resources used by this instance.

method.name: file_exists
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the file exists in the loaded zip archive. Must be called after [method open].

method.name: get_compression_level
method.description: Returns the compression level of the file in the loaded zip archive. Returns [code]-1[/code] if the file doesn't exist or any other error occurs. Must be called after [method open].

method.name: get_files
method.description: Returns the list of names of all files in the loaded archive as array of [String]s. Must be called after [method open]. [b]Note:[/b] This method support ZIP archives with UTF-8 or ASCII encoded filenames only, use [method get_files_raw] to read filenames in other encodings.

method.name: get_files_raw
method.description: Returns the list of names of all files in the loaded archive as array of unprocessed [PackedByteArray]s, use this method to read filenames in unsupported encoding. Must be called after [method open].

method.name: open
method.description: Opens the zip archive at the given [param path] and reads its file index.

method.name: read_file
method.description: Loads the whole content of a file with filename equal to [param path] in the loaded zip archive into memory and returns it. Must be called after [method open].

method.name: read_file_at
method.description: Loads the whole content of a file at position [param index] in the loaded zip archive into memory and returns it. Must be called after [method open].
